title: Vault Index Header Corrections
details:
The VaultIndexProcessor header issue has been identified:

ACTUAL PROBLEM:
- The MBA.md file (main index) is not being regenerated by the current command
- Only subfolder indexes are being processed: Digital Program, Value Program, XYZ Program
- These subfolders are correctly identified as hierarchy level 1 but they get template-type "main" in debug logs
- The main index (MBA.md) still shows "## Courses" instead of "## Programs"

ROOT CAUSE:
- The vault root folder (MBA) processing might follow a different code path
- The current command processes subfolders but not the root index file
- There may be separate logic for vault root vs subfolder index generation

CHANGES MADE:
- Fixed course level (hierarchy 2) to show "## Modules" instead of "## Classes" ✓
- Fixed spacing issues in Bases integration ✓
- BUT the main index header fix needs different approach

NEXT STEPS:
1. Find where vault root index generation happens
2. Fix the main index header logic
3. Verify that "MBA.md" gets regenerated with "## Programs"
